title: Homebuyer Excitement Soars for New Haven's September 19th Debut as Model Homes Near Completion at Ontario Ranch
text:
SOURCE: Brookfield Residential August 25, 2015 15:11 ET Homebuyer Excitement Soars for New Haven's September 19th Debut as Model Homes Near Completion at Ontario Ranch 
ONTARIO, CA--(Marketwired - Aug 25, 2015) - Excitement is soaring for the September 19th debut of New Haven in Ontario Ranch as the brand-new model homes near completion and homebuyers move one step closer to finding their happy place at Brookfield Residential's newest master-planned community. The community's highly anticipated Grand Opening is planned for Saturday, September 19th, when home shoppers will have their first opportunity to experience the smart designs and modern amenities of the three new-home neighborhoods, including the spacious single-family detached designs at Summerset and Waverly and low-maintenance, stylishly designed townhomes at Holiday. Buyers interested in a beautiful new home surrounded by robust recreation and endless fun without ever having to leave their community are encouraged to join New Haven's interest list today at www.NewHavenLife.com . 
"Whether buyers want the convenience of an attached home or need the space and versatility of a single-family detached home, they'll find just what they're looking for at New Haven in Ontario Ranch," said Mercedes Meserve, Vice President of Marketing for Brookfield Residential Southern California. " Join the interest list now to make sure you're among the first to experience this new community when it debuts on September 19th." 
With three beautiful new-home neighborhoods that embrace a diversity of lifestyles, New Haven continues Brookfield Residential's legacy of creating the best places to call home. Holiday 's 2-story townhomes offer 6 Spanish and Monterey-inspired designs ranging from approximately 976 to 1,811 square feet with 1 to 3 bedrooms, 1.5 to 2.5 baths, great rooms, modern kitchens, decks and patios (per plan) and 1 to 2-car garages. Plan 5 features an optional California garage that accesses the backyard through an additional garage-door opening. Pricing is anticipated from the high $200,000s to the mid $300,000s. 
Waverly 's 2-story single-family detached homes range from approximately 2,158 to 2,513 square feet with 4 to 5 bedrooms and 3 to 4.5 baths, great rooms, first floor bedrooms, 2-car garages and an upstairs bonus room that converts to a 5 th bedroom in Plan 3. Pricing is anticipated from the mid $400,000s. 
Summerset 's large single-family detached homes range from approximately 3,133 to 3,627 square feet with 4 to 5 bedrooms, 3 to 4.5 baths, impressive great rooms, dining rooms, first floor bedrooms, upstairs bonus rooms, 3-car garages and optional outdoor room. Pricing is anticipated from the mid $500,000s. 
New Haven's resort-style amenities include a 3,250 square-foot clubhouse; 2,800 square-foot multi-purpose room; 2 swimming pools; kids splash zone and super playground; BBQ pavilion, multiple picnic areas and fire pit; stage/amphitheater; on-site lifestyle director and more. 
The commuter-friendly location is near major freeways, with direct access to I-15 at the Cantu Galleano exit and less than 5 miles from the nearby Metrolink station. Ontario Mills, Eastvale Gateway, Victoria Gardens and the new Citizens Business Bank Arena offer easy leisure options. 
Ontario Ranch , located in the city of Ontario, California, will span across 8,200 acres and has been thoughtfully planned with attainably priced new neighborhoods, modern amenities and abundant recreation, elements that are the foundation of a well-rounded lifestyle. The future Chaffey Park will be the centerpiece of Ontario Ranch, a sprawling open space with parks and trails for playing, walking and exploring the outdoors. It has been sensibly planned to align with the goals of the Healthy Ontario Initiative and its efforts to provide residents with opportunities to enrich their wellbeing. Ontario Ranch is envisioned as a mixed‚Äêuse area that will encompass residential neighborhoods, commercial facilities and recreational amenities. Proposed plans include retail and business space, along with nearly 1,000 acres dedicated to public open space, parks and schools. A convenient location within close proximity to Interstate 15 at the Cantu Galleano Ranch Rd. exit will offer commuters easy access to major employment centers in LA, Riverside, San Bernardino and Orange counties. For more information visit www.OntarioRanch.com . 
For more information on New Haven, visit www.NewHavenLife.com . 
Prices effective date of publication.
